speaker: BLUNT
text:
What
               
              is
               
              thy
               
              name
               
              that
               
              in
               
              the
               
              battle
               
              thus

speaker: BLUNT
text:
Thou
               
              crossest
               
              me
              ?
               
              What
               
              honor
               
              dost
               
              thou
               
              seek

speaker: BLUNT
text:
Upon
               
              my
               
              head
              ?

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
Know
               
              then
               
              my
               
              name
               
              is
               
              Douglas
              ,

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
And
               
              I
               
              do
               
              haunt
               
              thee
               
              in
               
              the
               
              battle
               
              thus

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
Because
               
              some
               
              tell
               
              me
               
              that
               
              thou
               
              art
               
              a
               
              king
              .

speaker: BLUNT
text:
They
               
              tell
               
              thee
               
              true
              .

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
The
               
              Lord
               
              of
               
              Stafford
               
              dear
               
              today
               
              hath
               
              bought

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
Thy
               
              likeness
              ,
               
              for
               
              instead
               
              of
               
              thee
              ,
               
              King
               
              Harry
              ,

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
This
               
              sword
               
              hath
               
              ended
               
              him
              .
               
              So
               
              shall
               
              it
               
              thee
              ,

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
Unless
               
              thou
               
              yield
               
              thee
               
              as
               
              my
               
              prisoner
              .

speaker: BLUNT
text:
I
               
              was
               
              not
               
              born
               
              a
               
              yielder
              ,
               
              thou
               
              proud
               
              Scot
              ,

speaker: BLUNT
text:
And
               
              thou
               
              shalt
               
              find
               
              a
               
              king
               
              that
               
              will
               
              revenge

speaker: BLUNT
text:
Lord
               
              Stafford’s
               
              death
              .

speaker: HOTSPUR
text:
O
               
              Douglas
              ,
               
              hadst
               
              thou
               
              fought
               
              at
               
              Holmedon
               
              thus
              ,

speaker: HOTSPUR
text:
I
               
              never
               
              had
               
              triumphed
               
              upon
               
              a
               
              Scot
              .

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
All’s
               
              done
              ,
               
              all’s
               
              won
              ;
               
              here
               
              breathless
               
              lies
               
              the
               
              King
              .

speaker: HOTSPUR
text:
Where
              ?

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
Here
              .

speaker: HOTSPUR
text:
This
              ,
               
              Douglas
              ?
               
              No
              ,
               
              I
               
              know
               
              this
               
              face
               
              full
               
              well
              .

speaker: HOTSPUR
text:
A
               
              gallant
               
              knight
               
              he
               
              was
              ;
               
              his
               
              name
               
              was
               
              Blunt
              ,

speaker: HOTSPUR
text:
Semblably
               
              furnished
               
              like
               
              the
               
              King
               
              himself
              .

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
A
               
              fool
               
              go
               
              with
               
              thy
               
              soul
               
              whither
               
              it
               
              goes
              !

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
A
               
              borrowed
               
              title
               
              hast
               
              thou
               
              bought
               
              too
               
              dear
              .

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
Why
               
              didst
               
              thou
               
              tell
               
              me
               
              that
               
              thou
               
              wert
               
              a
               
              king
              ?

speaker: HOTSPUR
text:
The
               
              King
               
              hath
               
              many
               
              marching
               
              in
               
              his
               
              coats
              .

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
Now
              ,
               
              by
               
              my
               
              sword
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
               
              kill
               
              all
               
              his
               
              coats
              .

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
I’ll
               
              murder
               
              all
               
              his
               
              wardrobe
              ,
               
              piece
               
              by
               
              piece
              ,

speaker: DOUGLAS
text:
Until
               
              I
               
              meet
               
              the
               
              King
              .

speaker: HOTSPUR
text:
Up
               
              and
               
              away
              !

speaker: HOTSPUR
text:
Our
               
              soldiers
               
              stand
               
              full
               
              fairly
               
              for
               
              the
               
              day
              .

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Though I could ’scape shot-free at London,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I fear the shot here. Here’s no scoring but upon

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: the pate.—Soft, who are you? Sir Walter Blunt.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: There’s honor for you. Here’s no vanity. I am as hot

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: as molten lead, and as heavy too. God keep lead out

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: of me; I need no more weight than mine own

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: bowels. I have led my ragamuffins where they are

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: peppered. There’s not three of my hundred and fifty

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: left alive, and they are for the town’s end, to beg

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: during life. But who comes here?

speaker: PRINCE
text:
What
              ,
               
              stand’st
               
              thou
               
              idle
               
              here
              ?
               
              Lend
               
              me
               
              thy
               
              sword
              .

speaker: PRINCE
text:
Many
               
              a
               
              nobleman
               
              lies
               
              stark
               
              and
               
              stiff

speaker: PRINCE
text:
Under
               
              the
               
              hoofs
               
              of
               
              vaunting
               
              enemies
              ,

speaker: PRINCE
text:
Whose
               
              deaths
               
              are
               
              yet
               
              unrevenged
              .
               
              I
               
              prithee

speaker: PRINCE
text:
Lend
               
              me
               
              thy
               
              sword
              .

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: O Hal, I prithee give me leave to breathe

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: awhile. Turk Gregory never did such deeds in arms

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: as I have done this day. I have paid Percy; I have

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: made him sure.

speaker: PRINCE
text:
He
               
              is
               
              indeed
              ,
               
              and
               
              living
               
              to
               
              kill
               
              thee
              .

speaker: PRINCE
text:
I
               
              prithee
              ,
               
              lend
               
              me
               
              thy
               
              sword
              .

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Nay, before God, Hal, if Percy be alive, thou

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: gett’st not my sword; but take my pistol, if thou

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: wilt.

speaker: PRINCE
text:
Give
               
              it
               
              me
              .
               
              What
              ,
               
              is
               
              it
               
              in
               
              the
               
              case
              ?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Ay, Hal, ’tis hot, ’tis hot. There’s that will

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: sack a city.

speaker: PRINCE
text:
What
              ,
               
              is
               
              it
               
              a
               
              time
               
              to
               
              jest
               
              and
               
              dally
               
              now
              ?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Well, if Percy be alive, I’ll pierce him. If he do

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: come in my way, so; if he do not, if I come in his

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: willingly, let him make a carbonado of me. I like not

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: such grinning honor as Sir Walter hath. Give me

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: life, which, if I can save, so: if not, honor comes

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: unlooked for, and there’s an end.
